assign enabled = enable;

assign valid = en & ready;

always @(posedge clk)
begin
  if (enable) begin
    overflow <= en & ~ready;
  end else begin
    overflow <= en;
  end
end

data_mover # (
  .ID_WIDTH(ID_WIDTH),
  .DATA_WIDTH(DATA_WIDTH),
  .BEATS_PER_BURST_WIDTH(BEATS_PER_BURST_WIDTH)

Delete:
always @(posedge clk)
begin
  if (enable) begin
    overflow <= en & ~ready;
  end else begin
    overflow <= en;
end
Add:
always @(posedge clk)
  begin
    if (enable) begin
      overflow <= en & ~ready;
